LanguageData.OdysseyPatch_OutfitStandGroupsInBills: Allow looking in or hauling to groups of outfit stands in bills
LanguageData.OdysseyPatch_OutfitStandBodyType: Outfit stand body type is configurable
LanguageData.OdysseyPatch_FishingZoneCopy: Fishing zone settings can be copy/pasted
LanguageData.OdysseyPatch_AllowRemovingItemsFromOutfi: Allow removing items from outfit stands by default
LanguageData.OdysseyPatch_WorldSearchEmptyTiles: Allow full world search which searches all world tiles
LanguageData.OdysseyPatch_FloorsBlockedByHulls: Floors can erroneously be built under gravship hulls
LanguageData.OdysseyPatch_FishingInterruptions: Prevent pawns from fishing to starvation/exhaustion
LanguageData.OdysseyPatch_SilhouettesHiddenByGravship: Pawn dot highlights are erroneously visible during gravship cutscenes
LanguageData.OdysseyPatch_BodyTypeDesc: Click to change this outfit stand's model to a different body type.
LanguageData.OdysseyPatch_FishingZoneCopyDesc: Copy this fishing zone's settings to the clipboard so you can paste them onto another fishing zone.
LanguageData.OdysseyPatch_FishingZonePasteDesc: Overwrite this fishing zone's settings with those previously copied to the clipboard.
